title: Talking About the Debates
description: DeRay, Brittany, Clint and Sam share overlooked news to help inform your perspective as you watch this week's presidential debates. Then, DeRay is joined by presidential candidate Juli치n Castro to discuss his People First Policing policy proposal and how he is preparing for Wednesday's debate.
